妐字的基本解释

妐
zhōng
丈夫的父亲：“姑妐知之。”
丈夫的哥哥：兄妐。
丈夫的姐姐：女妐。

妐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhōng］
［《廣韻》職容切，平鍾，章。］
(1)丈夫的父亲。
(2)丈夫的姐姐。参见“女妐”。

妐字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　妐； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页256第14
【廣韻】職容切【集韻】諸容切，?音鍾。夫之兄也。　又關中呼夫之父曰妐。【呂覽】姑妐知之，曰：爲我婦而有外心，不可畜。

妐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
妐字的起名意思

暂无。

Acquaintance
Basic explanation of words
Acquaintance
zhōng
Husband's father: "My aunt knows it."
Husband's brother: brother-in-law.
Husband's sister: the wife.
Acquaintance
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhōng］
["Guangyun" job title cut, Ping Zhong, chapter. ]
(1) The husband's father.
(2) The husband's sister. See "women."
Acquaintance
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　妐; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 256 14
[Guang Yun] Job Rongqie [Jiyun] Zhu Rongqie,? Tone bell. Husband's brother also.　Guanzhong Hufu's father said 妐. [Lu Lan] The aunt knew it, and said: I have a heart for my wife, not a beast.
